RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 27 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE AUGUST 27, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race sinc e July 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME SUNDAY showed good early speed to set the early pace from the inside, raced near the two path down the backstretch and held gamely in the drive to remain clear under steady handling. BERTRADA was bumped at the start, settled off the early going, advanced mid way on the far turn, raced five wide into the upper stretch outside of rivals and finished well to rally for the place position. PALAGO broke to the outside, bumped with rival at the start, stalked the pace from the outside of foes racing four deep and kept on to the wire. ARCH FLYER tracked the early pace along the inside and weakened. FIRST SQUADRON stalked the pace along the inside and tired readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Sunday
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, held gamely, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Amy E. Dunne & Ciaran G. Dunne

ENTRY.NAME: First Squadron
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Arch Flyer
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Palago
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, stalked outside, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Bertrada
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break, settled, 5wd upper stretch, rallied

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAVE THE KING set a pressured pace along the inside, dug in deep stretch and prevailed under all out pressure. LUCKY ROMANCE pressed the early leader from the outside two deep and kept on gamely to the wire. Jockey of Luckey Romance claimed objection for interference around the far turn against Save the King and stewards ruled no change. BERNIN TUNE settled off the early pace, waited for racing nearing the five sixteenths pole racing near the rail, angled out and finished gamely late while closing in on the top pair. DOUBLE DRIBBLE dropped back off the early pace, moved up five wide into the upper stretch and lacked a rally. JET FLIGHT unhurried early on, saved ground and never threatened. IMPLEMENTER was off very slow, raced far back at the poor start and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Implementer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off very slow, far back,

ENTRY.NAME: Save the King
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured pace inside, dug in, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Romance
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2p outside, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Jet Flight
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Bernin Tune
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, inside, waited 5/16, angled, gamely late

ENTRY.NAME: Double Dribble
ENTRY.OWNER: Patricia's Hope LLC and Ravin Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5wd upper stretch, lacked rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LARRY THE POET quick to begin from the outside to cross over an set the early pace, raced off the inside in the stretch run and held well to be clear under steady pressure. CREPE YARNS settled off the early going, moved up into the far turn, raced five wide into the upper stretch and finished well to rally for the place position. BLACK RAVEN was off slow, rushed up inside, checked in the early stages, raced four to three wide in the lane and moved up late. GONE AGAIN broke sharply to the outside, chased the early leader two deep and weakened through the drive. STAR ON THE MAP sent along from the inside, checked early and faded the final quarter of a mile. SHINETHELIGHTONME took up at the break, ridden along between near the three eighths pole, lost ground and lacked a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Black Raven
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, rush inside, checked early, 4-3w, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Star On the Map
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent, checked early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Gone Again
ENTRY.OWNER: Ritter Charles W and Becker Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out sharply, chase 2p, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Shinethelightonme
ENTRY.COMMENT: took up break, ridden between 3/8, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Crepe Yarns
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 5wd upper stretch, rally place

ENTRY.NAME: Larry the Poet
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, held well, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Special Weight Purse 38000. FOR ILLINOIS REGISTERED, CONCEIVED AND/OR FOALED. Maidens, Fillies And Mares Three Years Old and Upward. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREEDOM ATTACK was off slowly, rushed up from the inside, angled through the far turn to race outside of No Nap Needed, raced well off the inside in the lane and held to prove best under strong handling. JOYZELLA dropped back off the early pace, moved up five to six wide around the far turn and finished gamely to the wire while racing from the outside. CAHOKIA POSSE was off slowly, raced off the early going, raced six wide into the upper stretch and finished willingly to the wire. TU ROYAL chased between early on, raced three to four wide around the far turn and weakened. NO NAP NEEDED showed good early speed along the inside to set the early pace and faltered in the drive. MADELYN ATTACK went to her nose at the start, saved ground and never was a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: No Nap Needed
ENTRY.OWNER: Young R Terry and Brown David J
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, rushed inside, angled, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Madelyn Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: went to nose start, inside, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Cahokia Posse
ENTRY.OWNER: Ritter Charles W and Becker Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, 6wd upper stretch, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Tu Royal
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between, 3-4 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Joyzella
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5-6 wide turn, gamely, outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 93. Claiming Purse 26000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since July 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming races for $16,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances). In the eve nt that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLY NIGHTLY stalked the early pace, moved up three to four wide in the lane and just got up under all out pressure. COMMAND CENTRAL showed good early foot, dug in along the inside deep stretch and missed in a game effort. STORM'S REFLECTION settled off the early pace, moved up along the inside into the upper stretch, angled and finished willingly to the wire. STORM BORN stalked the pace along the inside and raced evenly late with no closing run. DYNABLUE lag early on to trail, swung wide into the upper stretch and never threatened. SIERRA HOTEL stalked the early pace near the inside and tired readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Command Central
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, dug in, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Sierra Hotel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Born
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Dynablue
ENTRY.COMMENT: lag, wide upper stretch, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Fly Nightly
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3-4 wide, just up, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Storm's Reflection
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, inside upper stretch, angled, willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Claiming Purse 13500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GABRIELLA ATTACK was off slowly, unhurried early to race at the back of the pack, angled widest through the stretch and surged up late under strong pressure. LADY WHITE SOX stalked the pace, moved up six to seven wide into the upper stretch and finished gamely to the wire. ARRINGTON settled off the early pace, raced along the inside around the far turn through the stretch and finished gamely to the wire to just miss. UNGLUED bumped at the start, dueled two deep outside of rival and weakened the final eighth of a mile. SHE APPEALS HOLY dropped back early on, raced five to six wide in the lane and moved up to improve position. GO ON GIRL prompt the early pace three wide outside of rivals and weakened in the drive. RAIN ATTACK was bumped at the start, dueled from the inside and gave way. HOLY STAR bumped at the start, chased inside and tired. CUPID'S HOPE settled off the early and going and failed to respond while racing near the inside.

ENTRY.NAME: She Appeals Holy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5-6 wide lane, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Gabriella Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, unhurried early, wide run, surged up

ENTRY.NAME: Arrington
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, inside turn, rail lane, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Rain Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, duel inside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Unglued
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, dueled 2p, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Cupid's Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady White Sox
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 6-7w upper stretch, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Go On Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 3wd outside, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since July 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Claiming races for $3,200 or less not considered in eligibility and allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHERE'D THE DAY GO rated two deep down the backstretch, moved up three to four wide around the far turn, took aim into the upper stretch and finished well to edge clear under strong handlng. CHRISTMAS PRESENT stalked the pace, raced along the inside around the far turn, continued its inside run in the stretch, angled out nearing the sixteenth pole and finished gamely to the wire. GAGOOTS dropped back off the early pace, raced a bit wide through the far turn and moved up from the far outside in the lane. KRAMDEN was bumped at the start, raced two to three wide and moved up in the drive to improve position. ONE WAY HOME tracked the top pair down the backstretch three wide, made a strong bid through the far turn and weakened the final eighth of a mile. PISTOL BOX dropped back early on, raced wide in the stretch and had no response. OVERTHOUGHT was bumped at the start, showed good early foot along the inside and was empty in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Overthought
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pace inside, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Kramden
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, 2-3 wide, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Christmas Present
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, angled 1/16, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, outside, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Where'd the Day Go
ENTRY.OWNER: Donovitch Kevin W Rodriguez Eduardo M and Joy Kyle S
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 2p, 3-4 wide far turn, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: One Way Home
ENTRY.OWNER: Martinez Ralph and Martin Paul E
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3p, bid far turn, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Gagoots
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, outside bid, moved up
